definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: Store in a cool, dry place and kept away from children .
sentences.chinese: 宜放置阴凉干爽及儿童不能接触之处。

sentences.english: Bottle upright, away from the light, in a cool ventilated place.
sentences.chinese: 直立储藏于避光阴凉通风处。

sentences.english: This lot should be treed so that the house will be shaded in summer.
sentences.chinese: 这片地应当种上树，以便使房子在夏天处于阴凉之中。

sentences.english: Soft leather lining wicks away moisture leaving the foot cool and dry.
sentences.chinese: 排湿离开脚下的阴凉，干燥的软皮衬里。

sentences.english: Storage for ten months in shady room and dry place.
sentences.chinese: 贮于室内阴凉处，贮存期十个月。

sentences.english: Gluten has a better texture when it is cold, so it is better to store it in a cool place.
sentences.chinese: 面筋是越凉越有劲道，所以最好存放在阴凉的地方。

sentences.english: You should sit in the shade for a while.
sentences.chinese: 你应该在阴凉处坐一会。

sentences.english: The day was cool and rather lustreless; the first note of autumn had been struck.
sentences.chinese: 这天天气阴凉，光线暗淡，秋色已开始来临。

sentences.english: Fruit ripens not well in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 阴凉处的果子不会成熟。
我们必须把饭篮放在阴凉处。

sentences.english: Keep product in cool, dry places. Avoid direct sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 建议保存于阴凉通风处，避免阳光直射。

sentences.english: Take two capsules B. i. d. daily as a dietary supplement. Store in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 每次二粒，一天二次，存放于阴凉处。

sentences.english: Old women all like sitting in the tree shadows and gossiping on summer days.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶们到了夏天都爱坐在树阴凉儿里拉家常。

sentences.english: The curd is pressed overnight and stands for 4 days in a cool atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 凝乳要压一整夜，并在阴凉的地方保存4天。

sentences.english: Milk must be kept in a cool place, or else it will go sour.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶要放在阴凉地方，否则会发酸。

sentences.english: It's too hot, let's find a cool place C .
sentences.chinese: 这也太热了，让我们找一个阴凉的地方吃。

definition: (of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
